title: Textile, last half 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: stem and long-short satin stitch embroidery on brocade-patterened taby weave
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: White silk tabby, brocade-patterned, embroidered in colored silks, large scale serpentine floral design. Stem and long-short satin stitch.

Textile, last half 18th century.
last half 18th century. Medium: silk
